name: Ship Simulator Extremes: Ocean Cruise Ship
name_original: Ship Simulator Extremes: Ocean Cruise Ship
description:
Ship Simulator Extremes: Ocean Cruise Ship is a simulation game developed by VStep. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Paradox Interactive. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Ship Simulator Extremes: Ocean Cruise Ship on PC.
